column4: What is the latest stable Ubuntu release?  And can I upgrade to it from my 8.04?
9.10, an no, you need to go 8.04->8.10->9.04->9.10, you are better off clean installing (or you can wait and go 8.04->10.04)

That's the problem, right there.  Update manager doesn't show any reference at all to new distro releases being available.  I don't know that it ever did.  I did an update using it just today, but I still have 8.04 afterwards.
if you wanted to upgrade the hard way, you can enable it in System/Adminstration/Software Sources on the Update tab, switch from lts to normal releases
